Retraction of Decision on Troop Dispatch Demanded
articles.content:
Retraction of Decision on Troop Dispatch Demanded 
    Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Women's Society against the U.S. on June 30 reportedly made public a statement titled "U.S., out of Iraq" and demanded that the south Korean authorities retract the decision on troop dispatch to Iraq.
 The statement said it is the mockery of the people that the government authorities continue trying to force troop dispatch, ignoring the women's will against it.    
 It stressed that the government and the National Assembly should retract the decision on troop dispatch at an early date and immediately withdraw the already dispatched Sohui and Jema units from Iraq.

Congratulations to Nepalese King
articles.content:
Congratulations to Nepalese King
    Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Nepalese King Gyanendra Bir Bikram Shah Dev today on his birthday.
 Sincerely wishing him steady good health and happiness, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and develop in the future.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Swiss Guests
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Swiss Guests
    Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with Walter Fust, director general of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation of the Federal Department of Foreign Affairs, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
 Present there were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and Ueli Muller, resident coordinator of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation of the Federal Department of Foreign Affairs.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Contact Made
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Contact Made
    Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A contact between the heads of the delegations of the north and the south to the inter-Korean military working talks was made in Kaesong Monday.
 At the contact both sides had an exhaustive discussion on technical issues for narrowing some differences that cropped up in the course of reviewing the work done for the first-phase removal of propaganda means for the implementation of an appendix to the "Agreement on the prevention of accidental conflicts in the West Sea, stop to the propaganda activities in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and the removal of propaganda means" adopted at the North-South General-level Military Talks.    
 They agreed to buckle down to the second-phase undertaking to remove propaganda means in areas along the MDL from July 6.

articles.title: Film Show Held
articles.content:
Film Show Held
    Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces arranged a film show Monday on the occasion of the tenth anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
 Present there on invitation were members of the military attaches corps here.    
 The participants saw Part 3 of the Korean documentary film "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Is Immortal" which shows on grand epic scenes that he will always live in the hearts of humankind through facts that the world progressives honored his memory with most profound reverence.
